original_title: 2024 Home Sweet Home Automation: Plantpal Is a Friend to You Both
original_content:
One easy way to get started on the home automation front is with something that makes a house a home in the first place  lush, green plants. As nice as it is to have them around, it can be difficult to care (or remember to care) for them all the time.
Plantpal makes easy work of that, with an e-paper display that makes it plain as day how your plant is feeling. As you might expect, it features a soil moisture sensor, but what might be unexpected is that its capacitive instead of the usual resistive type. This way, no traces are exposed to the elements of plant life. It also has a BME688 sensor to monitor air quality and CO₂, so your plant has the chance to thrive.
Around back youll find an ESP32-C6, an AEM10941 for solar energy harvesting, and another set of solar panels. Be sure to check out the projects GitHub if you want to learn more about this adorable and useful device.
title: 家庭用自動化にはじめの一歩：Plantpalを活用しよう
body: 家庭用自動化を始める簡単な方法は、豊かな緑の植物でした。Plantpalは、電子ペーパーディスプレイを備え、植物の様子が一目でわかるようにする装置です。土壌湿度センサーとして予想される要素に加え、その性質が予想外である容量型センサーもあります。
